name: Saladigital
des: Blockchain-bases incentivized school and self-learning systems modeled upon our Learn-to-Earn method of self-learning, designed exclusively for Cambodia schools,  yet applicable for students and teachers everywhere

name: Digital Identity
des: A cornerstone Selendra (SEL) pilot application supporting cross-chain operations, and designed to safeguard digital identity, individual asset ownership, transfers, and Non Fungible Tokens (NFTs).
